articles.author: Jon Fingas
articles.title: Scientists sequence 64 human genomes to better reflect genetic diversity
articles.description: The Human Genome Project shed light on our species in 2001, but it was a patchwork of different humans' genes that didn't really reflect humanity's genetic makeup. Flash forward 20 years, however, and science is taking a significant leap forward. Researchers …

articles.title: Hear from Uber, Facebook and Netflix about diversity, equity and inclusion tomorrow at TC Sessions: Justice
